items.sentence: What Tom did was bad, but what Mary did was even worse.
Tom explained how an internal-combustion engine worked.
What makes you think that Tom won't be able to do that?
The door was kicked open by one of the police officers.
You're in a good mood today. Did something nice happen?
Yesterday, I ran into my teacher at the amusement park.
What are some things that Tom can do that you can't do?
Tom came out of his house with a big smile on his face.
I understand that this is a difficult decision for you.
I estimate that we'll need two days to finish the work.
